answers.answer: Hello!With a proper knee replacement and the patient not having any problems with infection, diabetes or any other chronic problem should recover with physiotherapy.I would suggest you to go for an X-ray of the present knee and also to follow up with another orthopedician for a second opinion comparing the old and new X-ray and then to go ahead.Take care!
